item.title: The so-called "Baths" of Rielves
item.description: Province Toledo Toletum (Pleiades) Location Rielves El Solao (Pleiades) Location Description A village of about 600 inhabitants 19 kilometers northwest of Toledo. The ruins of the villa are often called “termas” (baths). Garden The so-called “Baths” of Rielves Maps Plans Fig. 1: Plan of the "Baths" of Rielves. Images Bibliography Mª C. Fernández Castro, Las llamadas “Termas” de Rielves (Toledo), in Archivo Español de Arqueología, L-LI. CSIC, Madrid, 1978, pp. 209-251. (worldcat) Pleiades ID 266044 Publication date 21 Apr 2021
